CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Employee learning API - learner record sync
CurrentVersion.description: Assignments and learner records sync from providers/LMS connected to Viva Learning through the employee learning API.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Employee learning API - learner record sync
OldVersion.description:
Assignments and learner records sync from providers/LMS connected
to Viva Learning through the employee learning API.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Configure Viva Learning permissions by provider
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure permission settings for Viva Learning content by learning provider, ie. hide all content from a certain connected learning provider from certain users.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Configure Viva Learning permissions by provider
OldVersion.description:
Admins can configure permission settings for Viva
Learning content by learning provider, ie. hide all content from a certain
connected learning provider from certain users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: External Guest Sharing
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to share whiteboards with external guests of your tenant via a personal share link (PSL). This feature will respect any OneDrive/Sharepoint sharing settings your tenant has enabled. Additionally, if your tenant has Business to Business Invitation Manager (B2B IM) enabled, this feature will allow you to send a whiteboard via PSL to external users and B2B IM will create a guest user account for them so they can access the file.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: External Guest Sharing
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to share whiteboards with external guests of your tenant via a personal share link (PSL). This feature will respect any OneDrive/Sharepoint sharing settings your tenant has enabled. Additionally, if your tenant has Business to Business Invitation Manager (B2B IM) enabled, this feature will allow you to send a whiteboard via PSL to external users and B2B IM will create a guest user account for them so they can access the file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
OldVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft 365 Groups connected Viva Goals Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now save time with a simplified set-up experience for setting up their Viva Goals Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft 365 Groups connected Viva Goals Teams
OldVersion.description: Users will now save time with a simplified set-up experience for setting up their Viva Goals Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Get link preview and interact with goals directly within Microsoft Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to access and interact with goal progress directly within Outlook email, enabling them to stay within the flow of work.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Get link preview and interact with goals directly within Microsoft Outlook
OldVersion.description: Users will now be able to access and interact with goal progress directly within Outlook email, enabling them to stay within the flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - SharePoint site selection enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
,

With this update, Insider Risk Management admins can add any SharePoint sites as priority content or exclude certain SharePoint sites in Insider Risk Management policies by searching the site names or using the exact URLs. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - SharePoint site selection enhancement
OldVersion.description:
,

With this update, Insider Risk Management admins can add any SharePoint sites as priority content or exclude certain SharePoint sites in Insider Risk Management policies by searching the site names or using the exact URLs. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Keyword highlight support for document trainable classifiers
CurrentVersion.description: Highlight the keywords/phrases that are contributing significantly to the Trainable classifier results, so that users can easily understand the classification of the documents. This would build trust of the users of the OOB classifications and empower them to create DLP policies.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Keyword highlight support for document trainable classifiers
OldVersion.description: Highlight the keywords/phrases that are contributing significantly to the Trainable classifier results, so that users can easily understand the classification of the documents. This would build trust of the users of the OOB classifications and empower them to create DLP policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quickly capture content in Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables you to quickly capture content shared in a Teams meeting on a mobile device and save it in your photo gallery or share in Teams and other apps. We’ll honor privacy choices set in the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quickly capture content in Teams mobile
OldVersion.description:
This feature enables
you to quickly capture content shared in a Teams meeting on a mobile device and
save it in your photo gallery or share in Teams and other apps. We’ll honor
privacy choices set in the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhancements to DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, we are adding several enhancements to DLP capabilities for macOS endpoints including the ability to create groups of USB, Printer, and Network share and apply different restrictions to different groups; support for most restrictive actions against multiple rule matches; and support for Network share exclusion.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhancements to DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
OldVersion.description: With this update, we are adding several enhancements to DLP capabilities for macOS endpoints including the ability to create groups of USB, Printer, and Network share and apply different restrictions to different groups; support for most restrictive actions against multiple rule matches; and support for Network share exclusion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting "Recording & Transcription" tab will be replaced by "Recap" tab
CurrentVersion.description: Now, the “Recap” tab for scheduled meetings will include access to the recording and transcript.  For meetings that have a “Recap” tab, the previous “Recording & Transcription” tab will be removed since the “Recap” tab will replace it. For meetings that don’t have a “Recap” tab, users can continue to access the recording and transcript from the “Recording & Transcription” tab.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting "Recording & Transcription" tab will be replaced by "Recap" tab
OldVersion.description:
Now,
the “Recap” tab for scheduled meetings will include access to the recording and
transcript.  For meetings that have a “Recap” tab, the previous “Recording
& Transcription” tab will be removed since the “Recap” tab will replace it.
For meetings that don’t have a “Recap” tab, users can continue to access the
recording and transcript from the “Recording & Transcription” tab.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Global Address List updates in new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: We are making some adjustments to the GAL search and browse experiences. Users will be asked to type in more characters to refine their search in some cases. There will be some other visual improvements in error messaging. Another way to find recipients is by using the suggestion dropdown picker in the To/Cc/Bcc lines.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Global Address List updates in new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
OldVersion.description:
We are making some
adjustments to the GAL search and browse experiences. Users will be
asked to type in more characters to refine their search in some cases. There
will be some other visual improvements in error messaging. Another way to find recipients is by using the suggestion
dropdown picker in the To/Cc/Bcc lines.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Weekly Active User Reporting in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Total number of unique users who have launched the Viva Learning personal app in the last 7 days.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share contact information of people in Microsoft Teams chat
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now share the contact information of someone who is not in a chat to make it easy for others to confidently get to know other collaborators.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Recap now available for Copilot users
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot users can access intelligent recap after meetings to get a summary of the meeting, including: personalized timeline markers to easily browse the recordings by when you joined or left, when a screen was shared, and when your name was mentioned; browse recordings by speakers, chapters, and topics; as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, tasks, and jump to name mentions in the transcript.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward Messages in Teams chats
CurrentVersion.description: Forward messages quickly from one chat to another using the right-click menu. You can add additional content to the message to provide context and clarity for the recipient. You can forward messages to 1:1 chats and group chats.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward Messages in Teams chats
OldVersion.description:
Forward
messages quickly from one chat to another using the right-click menu. You can
add additional content to the message to provide context and clarity for the
recipient. You can forward messages to 1:1 chats and group chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning employee learning API Content sync
CurrentVersion.description: Content Sync API, which enables learning content hosted on learning systems to show up across the Viva Learning user experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning employee learning API Content sync
OldVersion.description:
Content Sync API, which enables learning content
hosted on learning systems to show up across the Viva Learning user experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Browser optimized playback for SuccessFactors content
CurrentVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Academies in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Academies in Viva Learning provide a guided learning experience to employees to improve their skills.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Academies in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description:
Academies in Viva Learning provide a guided
learning experience to employees to improve their skills.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: learning path creation
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can create learning paths from learning objects in Viva Learning. Learning paths are discoverable, consumable, and shareable by employees at the organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: learning path creation
OldVersion.description: ,Admins can create learning paths from learning objects in Viva Learning. Learning paths are discoverable, consumable, and shareable by employees at the organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Progress tracking for Learning paths
CurrentVersion.description: Now in Viva Learning, users will be able to track their progress on different courses within the Learning path.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Progress tracking for Learning paths
OldVersion.description:
Now in Viva Learning, users will be able to
track their progress on different courses within the Learning path.
